vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.1.1;
son of: Tohu (H8459);
father of: Jeroham (H3395); also called Eliab at 1Ch.6.27; Eliel at 1Ch.6.34;
§ Elihu = "He is my God"
1) the younger man who rebuked Job and his three friends
2) an Ephraimite, Samuel's great grandfather
3) a Manassite warrior chief for David
4) son of Shemaiah and Korhite gatekeeper
5) David's brother
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Semaías; portero; tribu de Leví; (b)   hermano de David; jefe; tribu de Judá ; (a) אֱלִיאֵל ,אֱלִיאָב   descendiente de Elcaná; abuelo de Samuel; tribu de Leví; (b)   guerrero; tribu de Manasés; en tiempos de David; (c)   amigo de Job
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利戶 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他是我的神"
1) 譴責約伯與其三位朋友的年輕人
2) 一位以法蓮人, 掃羅王的曾祖父 (撒上 1:1)
3) 大衛王手下的一位瑪拿西的軍長 (代上 12:20)
4) 可拉族人示瑪雅的兒子, 他是負責守門的壯士之一 (代上 26:7)
5) 大衛的一位哥哥 (代上 27:18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利户 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他是我的神"
1) 谴责约伯与其三位朋友的年轻人
2) 一位以法莲人, 扫罗王的曾祖父 (撒上 1:1)
3) 大卫王手下的一位玛拿西的军长 (代上 12:20)
4) 可拉族人示玛雅的儿子, 他是负责守门的壮士之一 (代上 26:7)
5) 大卫的一位哥哥 (代上 27:18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.20
§ Elihu = "He is my God"
1) the younger man who rebuked Job and his three friends
2) an Ephraimite, Samuel's great grandfather
3) a Manassite warrior chief for David
4) son of Shemaiah and Korhite gatekeeper
5) David's brother

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.7;
son of: Shemaiah (H8098I);
brother of: Othni (H6273), Rephael (H7501), Obed (H5744J), Elzabad (H0443H) and Semachiah (H5565)
§ Elihu = "He is my God"
1) the younger man who rebuked Job and his three friends
2) an Ephraimite, Samuel's great grandfather
3) a Manassite warrior chief for David
4) son of Shemaiah and Korhite gatekeeper
5) David's brother

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.18;
son of: Jesse (H3448);
brother of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Ozem (H0684)
§ Elihu = "He is my God"
1) the younger man who rebuked Job and his three friends
2) an Ephraimite, Samuel's great grandfather
3) a Manassite warrior chief for David
4) son of Shemaiah and Korhite gatekeeper
5) David's brother

A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Job.32.2;
son of: Barachel (H1292)
§ Elihu = "He is my God"
1) the younger man who rebuked Job and his three friends
2) an Ephraimite, Samuel's great grandfather
3) a Manassite warrior chief for David
4) son of Shemaiah and Korhite gatekeeper
5) David's brother
